title: Ground News - Songs Tell Us There will be a rain of stars in New Year's Special
text:
Summary by Ak�am The trailer for the New Year's special episode of Songs Tell Us, featuring Sibel Can, Hakan Altun and Hüsnü Şenici, which was brought to the screen on Kanal D, was shown. In Songs Tell Us, famous names will appear before the audience as guests. Share menu More

In Songs Tell Us, famous names will appear before the audience as guests.
